programme.title: Caught in the Draft

programme.title: Caught in the Draft

programme.title: Caught in the Draft

programme.title: Caught in the Draft
programme.desc: In a draft that would be remembered for Walter Payton, top pick Steve Bartkowski sets the NFL world afire by asking his college dorm-mate Leigh Steinberg to negotiate his contract.

programme.title: Caught in the Draft

programme.title: Caught in the Draft
programme.desc: Bill Walsh trades up with the New England Patriots and lands wide receiver Jerry Rice. But former Bengals head coach Sam Wyche reveals Walsh's frantic efforts to instead trade for Eddie Brown.

programme.title: Caught in the Draft

programme.title: Caught in the Draft
